group_1.textLeft: Please, please!@I want you to show me too!

group_1.textRight: No means no!
I'm begging you, please quiet down.

group_1.textLeft: Nngh...

group_1.textRight: Stai zitta!@You're so loud, Alina can't sleep.

group_1.textLeft: Alina...!

group_1.textRight: Why the hell is it you are so loud this morning?

group_1.textLeft: You see, I'm getting better and better at@moving around,
so I thought now's a great opportunity to try@doing a medical manga.

group_1.textRight: YOU are...?

group_1.textLeft: But it's kinda hard to depict a surgery...
I asked the nurse if I could shadow the real deal@as reference material,
but I knew it wouldn't happen...

group_1.textRight: Hmm... So you have a draft made?

group_1.textLeft: It's about halfway!@Since you're here, I'll show you!
Aaaaah!! My draft―?!

group_1.textRight: You said depiction of surgery, but the problem@lies way before that.
The storyboard is crude and dull, as well as@the rough sketches you have drawn.
To say clearly, che disastro.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101202:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Aw...even without your memories, you're the@same Alina as always...

group_1.textRight: You should know your place, Fool Girl.
No matter how Alina looks at it, you are flat-out@incapable of weaving such a theme.
That being so, why not create something more@like what only you can make?

group_1.textLeft: Something only...I can make...?
...If I knew what, I wouldn't be struggling...

group_1.textCenter: Haa...I gotta start looking for material again...

group_1.textLeft: Okay, the injection's all done. See?@That didn't hurt one bit, did it?

group_1.textRight: You're right~!@That didn't hurt at all!

group_1.textLeft: Hehe, I've been keeping this a secret, but...@The truth is, I'm actually a magician.

group_1.textRight: Ehh―?! Amazing!
...So, you completed your new work's@storyboard already?

group_1.textLeft: Sure did! The title is "Magical Nurse☆Mint"!
She's a fledgling nurse, the heroine Mint.
It's a story about healing the darkness that roots@itself in every person's heart!
I wanted you to be the first to see it, Alina!
Please give me your honest opinions on it!

group_1.textRight: Alina hates being made advisor involuntarily,@ya know.
...Well, Alina is not busy, so she will play along...

group_1.textLeft: Thanks a bunch!
So...what'd you think?

group_1.textRight: The key point, curing with magic, is an opportune@development on your part,
but such display is half-assed, unmistakable@poor work.

group_1.textLeft: Owww...I knew it was coming, but hearing you@say it still hurts.

group_1.textRight: ...But, it is more like YOU, no?

group_1.textLeft: ...Heh...?@Was that a compliment...?

group_1.textRight: Alina meant your dumbness is leaking from@your head.

group_1.textLeft: (I don't understand what Alina truly wants, but...)
(She called it poor "work", instead of@"che disastro" this time,)
(so am I right in thinking I've made progress@since then...?)

group_1.textRight: Haa...perhaps it is from being forced to read such@poor work, but Alina's throat is dry...

group_1.textLeft: Then I'll go buy some strawberry milk!

group_1.textRight: Why strawberry milk...?
